analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CCOIN.withdrawFromEscrow (/unique_chucks/37/0x6be9dbfca46651a6a2726b4b695edfb1cf0fbfb0.sol#583-598):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(agreement.creator() == msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/37/0x6be9dbfca46651a6a2726b4b695edfb1cf0fbfb0.sol#588-589)
	- reward = agreement.getClaimableRewards(_id) (/unique_chucks/37/0x6be9dbfca46651a6a2726b4b695edfb1cf0fbfb0.sol#590-593)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/37/0x6be9dbfca46651a6a2726b4b695edfb1cf0fbfb0.sol#593-594)
	- balances (/unique_chucks/37/0x6be9dbfca46651a6a2726b4b695edfb1cf0fbfb0.sol#594-598)

CCOIN.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/37/0x6be9dbfca46651a6a2726b4b695edfb1cf0fbfb0.sol#429-430) shadows:
	- ERC20.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/37/0x6be9dbfca46651a6a2726b4b695edfb1cf0fbfb0.sol#372)

Escrow.completeDeliverable (/unique_chucks/37/0x6be9dbfca46651a6a2726b4b695edfb1cf0fbfb0.sol#24-30) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-content.completeDeliverable(_id) (/unique_chucks/37/0x6be9dbfca46651a6a2726b4b695edfb1cf0fbfb0.sol#26-27)

Agreement.extendExpiration (/unique_chucks/37/0x6be9dbfca46651a6a2726b4b695edfb1cf0fbfb0.sol#357-366) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_expiration > expiration && _expiration >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/37/0x6be9dbfca46651a6a2726b4b695edfb1cf0fbfb0.sol#364-366)

Agreement.createdOn should be constant (/unique_chucks/37/0x6be9dbfca46651a6a2726b4b695edfb1cf0fbfb0.sol#269-270)
